long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A convenient tool for GMGN.AI token holders management that allows you to quickly add annotations to wallet addresses.

Key Features:
- One-click batch annotation for top token holders
- Automatically preserves existing wallet remarks
- Real-time progress tracking
- Smart combination of token symbol with holder ranking
- Seamless integration with GMGN.AI interface

Perfect for token analysts and traders who need to efficiently manage and track wallet addresses on GMGN.AI. The extension adds a simple button to token detail pages, enabling quick and organized wallet labeling while maintaining your existing annotations.

Note: Requires GMGN.AI account login to function.
